document_data.name: Tyranny
document_data.mainbody: '''''Tyranny''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[enchantment]] [[spell]] used only by specialty priests devoted to [[Gilgeam]] called [[Martinet]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell enabled to caster to command obedience from anyone within a {{SI|120|ft}} radius. Any creature unable to resist the spell's magic would obey the caster as if he were their king provided the caster did not command them to perform actions against their nature. A Martinet using this spell against Gilgeam's wishes would be punished severely.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] the Martinet's holy symbol and a [[gold]]en circlet worth at least 250 [[gp]] to cast. The circlet was placed upon the Martinet's head during the casting and vanished upon the spell's completion.
